- [93mGram[0m-[93mscale[0m [93msynthesis[0m of the [93mthiazolidinedione[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mmitoNEET[0m [93mligand[0m [93mNL[0m-[93m1[0m [93musing[0m a [93mHantzsch[0m [93mester[0m [93mreduction[0m.: [93mMitoNEET[0m ([93mCISD1[0m), an [[93m2Fe[0m-[93m2S[0m] [93mcluster[0m [93mprotein[0m [93mlocated[0m on the [93mouter[0m [93mmitochondrial[0m [93mmembrane[0m and [93mknown[0m for its [93mrole[0m in [93mcellular[0m [93mredox[0m [93mregulation[0m and [93mbioenergetics[0m, [93mhas[0m been [93midentified[0m as a [93mnovel[0m [93mferroptosis[0m-[93mrelated[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mtarget[0m in [93mneurodegeneration[0m and [93mcancer[0m.
